ul.li:
Include these codes as defined in http://fhir.org/guides/itech-uw/who-smart-hiv-dak/CodeSystem/concept-codes
CodeDisplayDefinition
HIV.B.DE137Offer male and female condoms and condom-compatible lubricantsPrevention services offered and referrals - Offer male and female condoms and condom-compatible lubricants
HIV.B.DE138Offer pre-exposure prophylaxis (PrEP) for people at substantial ongoing risk of HIV infectionPrevention services offered and referrals - Offer pre-exposure prophylaxis (PrEP) for people at substantial ongoing risk of HIV infection
HIV.B.DE139Offer post-exposure prophylaxis (PEP) following suspected exposurePrevention services offered and referrals - Offer post-exposure prophylaxis (PEP) following suspected exposure
HIV.B.DE140Voluntary medical male circumcision (VMMC)Prevention services offered and referrals - Voluntary medical male circumcision (VMMC)
HIV.B.DE141Harm reduction for people who inject drugsPrevention services offered and referrals - Harm reduction for people who inject drugs
HIV.B.DE142Behavioural interventions to support risk reduction, particularly for people with HIV and members of key populationsPrevention services offered and referrals - Behavioural interventions to support risk reduction, particularly for people with HIV and members of key populations
HIV.C.DE118Male and female condoms and condom-compatible lubricants offeredPrevention services offered and referrals - Male and female condoms and condom-compatible lubricants offered
HIV.C.DE119Voluntary medical male circumcision (VMMC) referralPrevention services offered and referrals - Voluntary medical male circumcision (VMMC) referral
HIV.C.DE120Harm reduction for people who inject drugsPrevention services offered and referrals - Harm reduction for people who inject drugs
HIV.C.DE121Behavioural interventions to support risk reductionPrevention services offered and referrals - Behavioural interventions to support risk reduction

HIV.D.DE148Harm reduction for people who inject drugsPrevention services offered and referrals - Harm reduction for people who inject drugs
